Posts.Content: Mar 21, 2008 01:35PM teharring wrote: I had 4 AC and 4 taxol, and alternated between my wrist and my hand. The veins further up in my arm were fine, but my nurse said that putting the iv in my hand or wrist would be more comfortable since the infusions were so long. Best of luck.
